phrases: 23rd - Summer Break 25th - Summer School Starts
x becomes 4. Substitute this value in the formula to calculate the value of y.
Now you can derive the coordinates at the top, enabling you to draw a graph.
31st - Gala Concert
You are totally distracted!
I am doing what I am supposed to.
You were playing reluctantly!
It sounded like your heart was not in it!
Listen...
Do we have to play this piece for the gala concert?
What is that?
Is there a problem?
For a gala concert, we should be playing something more glamorous.
Let us change it to something more major...
No way!
This is the song I want to play.
Do not worry, do not worry.
If you and I play it, it will sound glamorous enough.
I wonder why you are so reluctant to play it?
When the score was overflowing with so much love for you?
Kreisler's... Love's Joy.
Love's... Sorrow.
Love's Sorrow, the companion piece to Love's Joy by Kreisler, was written for the violin.
There is a piano version of this song arranged by Rachmaninoff.
Huh?
Did I stick it here?
Falling asleep under the piano again...
You are going to catch a cold.
You have gotten heavy, have not you?
Kousei...
This is your punishment.
The piano is not responding to you, is it?
I wish you would just die.
I cannot hear!
Help me, Mom!
I wonder why you are so reluctant to play it?
Why?
Because it reminds me of my mother.
Hiroko-san, I have got to practice...
No sweat, no sweat!
It is good to have a change of scenery, to take a breather!
Cotton candy!
Frappes!
Hey, do not get lost on me.
Rachmaninoff's Love's Sorrow.
Saki used to play that all the time since we were students.
She used to play it a lot as a lullaby.
This piece just reeks too much of my mom.
So raw... and vivid...
It closes in on me...
My mother must have had despised me, right?
No mother on earth despises her own child.
That day...
That was the moment you grew up, both as a person and as a pianist.
There is no way that would not make Saki happy.
There you are!
Sorry!
But it is just a little bit sad, you know.
To see your kid grow away from you...
My mom...
Do you think she will forgive me?
For trying so hard to forget all about her?
Is it all right for me to play the piano?
If that is how you feel, play.
If there is something holding you back, then play with conviction,
and try to hear Saki's voice.
Voice...
Do not sit there brooding over ridiculous matters,
it is high time you manned up!
Play.
You and I are pianists, you know.
A candy apple.
You do not like candy apples?
It is not like that.
It is just that I have never had one before...
Do not cry!
I will eat it!
I will eat it, okay?
Thanks!
Am I being too harsh with him?
But he is got to play.
So that he can mature as a pianist...
So that he can say goodbye.
Jeez!
31st - Gala Concert
Look how late it is!
Yeah, because you would not give up.
What a baby!
What about you, you kept whining about the piece!
Since we are so late coming home, I wonder if your folks are mad...
Hey, look up there!
At the sky!
You are ignoring me?
The stars are so beautiful.
It is like the stars are speaking to us!
Twinkle, twinkle, little star, how I wonder what you are.
Up above the world so high, like a diamond in the sky.
Twinkle, twinkle, little star, how I wonder what you are.
A cake shop?
I am home!
Hold on a sec!
I will be heading home now.
What do you want with my daughter?
Arima-kun?
Arima-kun?
Hey, if it is not Arima-kun!
These are just leftovers, but have your fill, all right?
Th-Thank you very much!
We have got some test samples, too, right?
Oh, but I have already had more than enough...
My parents are fans of yours.
When I was little, they came to hear you a lot.
I heard all about it, Arima-kun!
You should not abort your performances.
That is like flushing all your struggles till now down the drain!
It is like baking a moist sponge cake,
only for it to be totally ruined by some horrible-tasting cream!
Sorry about that.
But I like a young man who does the unheard-of!
Good for you!
Once it is inside your stomach, there is no difference.
Since the ingredients are all the same.
Thank you very much!
Want to see some pictures of Kaori back in grade school?
She was so adorable!
We have some from kindergarten, too!
Do not show him!
Here, for your folks.
Thank you very much.
And thank you for all the cake.
We will be going to the gala concert to cheer you on.
Good luck!
Right, I will do my best.
I will walk you to the street.
So that is Arima-kun, huh?
He is got manners, and he is a good kid, do not you think?
Yes...
Really!
They even hauled out the pictures of me as a newborn!
Stark naked, no less!
I can never get married now!
You sure have cheerful parents.
My mom's always stuffing starving dogs with food.
Starving?
Huh?
Hey, did you get taller?
Huh?
I do not know...
Oh, I see.
It is because you are not looking down anymore.
Anyway, it sure is hot this year.
A meaningless conversation.
Familiar scenery.
It is so humid!
It is so deplorable,
it is really muggy, do not you think?
Even so, the reason I remember it so well is probably...
Oh, but I do like summer because there are fireworks.
31st - Gala Concert
Make that part flow more elegantly!
But the accompanist cannot just ignore instructions!
Or else the violin will not stand out.
It will too stand out!
Because I am going to be playing it!
It is peaceful.
You are so arrogant!
Follow what I am doing!
Where is my green tea and red bean shaved ice?
It is not that simple!
You runaway horse!
Huh?
I am eating it.
You monster!
That was my shaved ice!
I have had enough!
I do not want to go to summer school!
I want to play!
I want to go to the festival!
I want to watch fireworks!
It is peaceful.
Done!
The year's first fireworks!
So pretty!
You sure we will not get caught?
Sneaking into the pool area and lighting firecrackers...
Oh, no worries!
I mean, the teachers have all gone home anyway.
And as for water, we have got a whole boatload at our disposal!
But lay off the rockets, okay?
Kashiwagi-san?
Oh, crap!
Summer school again tomorrow!
Well, just suck it up.
It is your fault for being a moron.
Shut up, you lousy scholarship student!
What are you two going to do?
I mean high school.
You are not attending summer school,
so does that mean you two are on the music college track?
I am...
For now, let me just say that I am going to rock the audience at the gala,
and claim the spotlight!
Because we are the almighty duo, after all!
That is the spirit, that is the spirit!
So glorious!
Yeah... those two look great together.
What are you gaping at?
Why?
Why?
It is totally dark at the bottom...
I cannot hear a sound...
It is like my...
Help me... please help me.
I cannot hear anything.
It is dark... it is dark...
The fact that you cannot hear the notes means...
Not bound by sound?
The images you have within you.
The sounds that rise up from the bottom of your soul...
You have been letting them override all else without realizing it.
The sounds within you, the imagined scenery...
Was not there ever a moment when you sensed...
the notes suffused with your desires and emotions?
Losing the ability to hear the notes.
I am sure that that is a gift.
A gift?
Close your eyes, cover your ears, and play as you feel for now.
You have the technical ability to pull that off.
The ability to trace the sounds within you, the sounds you imagine.
And those are the memories Saki left you...
Did you get taller?
Oh, I see.
It is because you are not looking down anymore.
It is because you are looking up now.
Kousei!
Kousei...
He is alive!
He is in pain!
That is proof that he is alive!
How could you...?
How could you drown in such a shallow pool?
Everyone is going to blame me!
He freakin' slammed his head right into his savior's face.
Not bad.
Is it because it is a pool?
Is it because the moon's out?
Maybe... just maybe, the light can reach even the bottom of a dark ocean.
31st - Gala Concert
Miyazono-san's playing, too, right?
Yeah, that kid who stopped playing midway.
The people who run this are reckless for sure.
I think she will actually make an impact.
Cannot wait.
Wonder if she will play it right today?
She will probably go bonkers again.
Well, I came today just to see her.
Curse
All right!
There is nobody I know around here.
Emi?
Are not you going to take your seat?
Ms. Ochiai?
Uh... did you call me Emi?
I am the one who told you about Arima-kun being an accompanist today.
N-N-N-Not that I came here to see Arima...
I am just here to enjoy some violin music...
Here is your program.
Let us go.
It will be starting soon.
You witch!
No judging at gala concerts, so we can just sit back and enjoy ourselves.
With this level of talent, we can certainly afford to listen like everyone else...
Now then, is it almost time for my favorite?
Kaori Miyazono Sumitani Junior Highschool
What does she think she is doing?
The violinist a no-show?
That is just insane!
Who is she, Michelangeli?
Pogoreli?
The show's started.
Kao-chan's not here yet?
What am I supposed to do?
Is Kaori Miyazono this unpredictable?
I have been calling her cell, but she is totally not picking up.
Watari-kun
This is serious.
I cannot...
Let us go in and get prepared.
So we will be ready whenever Miyazono does show up.
Please, keep calling Miyazono's cell.
Right!
Onee-sama!
I am counting on you.
Madam!
Good luck!
What should we do?
I will go ask if they will move you guys down in the order.
Since it is a gala concert, they might be a little more flexible.
As long as we can get the performers to agree...
We can wait on Miyazono till the last possible second.
Why...
If that does not pan out, we will just have to forget it.
Yes... you are right.
But why?
What will you do?
This is the song I want to play!
Were not you looking forward to this?
I was an idiot for getting carried away.
It is almost Kaori Miyazono's turn.
Wonder what she is going to do this time?
It is been a while since I have felt this excited.
That is unacceptable.
Please!
She is on a bus right now, on her way here!
Be that as it may, I do not have the authority to...
What is going on?
Miike-kun?
Miike-kun...
He is the final act of the junior high division?
That is right, being that he won the competition.
Nice timing!
Sorry, but could you let them play after you?
Our violinist's running late.
Running late?
Her name's Kaori Miyazono.
I am sure she will be here soon.
You think you could let her play after you?
Miyazono-san's playing, too, right?
Cannot wait!
Absolutely not.
The final act of this gala concert...
The starring role... it is mine.
Well, of course it is.
It is your moment of triumph, after all.
We only have ourselves to blame.
I apologize for being so presumptuous.
Looks like we are going to have to withdraw.
A-Anyway,
it is her own fault for being late on a day like this.
Her playing's such a mess, no wonder her lifestyle's all messed up too.
She thinks she is special just because the audience kind of liked her,
so she shows up late without a second thought!
You do not have to go that far...
But is not that a fact?
The music is written in the score.
What she produces is disastrous.
It is not music or anything at all!
You little brat, who are you to talk like that?
All right, then.
Sorry for causing a disturbance before you perform.
Come on, Kousei,
are not you pissed at all?
He insulted your partner!
Let us go by the program.
Please perform the final act of the junior high division, Miike-san.
However...
The spotlight!
Today's spotlight belongs to us.
The promoters' choice for the junior high division, Ms. Kaori Miyazono.
Here she comes!
At last.
It is Miyazono.
She got here in time?
It is Kaori Miyazono.
Is not he the accompanist?
Where is the violinist?
Where is Miyazono-san?
Arima, surely you are not playing alone...?
Unprecedented.
Kousei...
Twinkle Little Star
Episode 13 Love's Sadness
Watch Again Next Week!
Two People on a Bike is Forbidden By Law
